Reentrancy in CrowdsaleBase.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/27/0x56a9a9b7de3f4a6ffe1f61319aa33b49ede13590.sol#419-474):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/27/0x56a9a9b7de3f4a6ffe1f61319aa33b49ede13590.sol#430-442)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/27/0x56a9a9b7de3f4a6ffe1f61319aa33b49ede13590.sol#457-463)

	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/27/0x56a9a9b7de3f4a6ffe1f61319aa33b49ede13590.sol#458-461)

CrowdsaleBase.getState (/unique_chucks/27/0x56a9a9b7de3f4a6ffe1f61319aa33b49ede13590.sol#639-668) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/27/0x56a9a9b7de3f4a6ffe1f61319aa33b49ede13590.sol#653-667)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/27/0x56a9a9b7de3f4a6ffe1f61319aa33b49ede13590.sol#652-667)

CrowdsaleBase.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x56a9a9b7de3f4a6ffe1f61319aa33b49ede13590.sol#284-287)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x56a9a9b7de3f4a6ffe1f61319aa33b49ede13590.sol#183)
